title: Typo in Xayah's Bio
body: This is not much of a bug, but just something I found while messing around in the client. In Xayah's bio, there is a typo where there should be a "to", but instead it is shown as "ot", just thought I'd put this out there so it could be fixed!

replies.body:
Hi hi! 

Nice catch! :) I'll see if I can snag someone to put in a quick fix.
